name: Survive The Zombie Defense 3D
description:
There is someone walking behind you. Exact, something, not someone, because this is dead walking zombies, and its want to kill you. Try to save your life in Survive The Zombie Defense 3D adventures!

HOW TO PLAY: Use joystick to move, use shooting buttons to aim and shoot. You can hide from zombies in houses, or you can try to kill them. Use everything that can help you – even simple shovel can save your life.

Survive The Zombie Defense 3D game features:
• Zombie apocalypse simulator in 3D;
• Strategy survival game genre;
• Virtual 3D city to explore.

Survive The Zombie Defense 3D – try to escape the city using your strategy skills. Look behind – they are almost here.
